item.title: Changing Cache Directory
item.dc:creator: @gimpie gimpie
item.description:
@gimpie wrote:

so ive changed my cache on my server and my client. the server is fine and worked perfectly but i cant seem to change it in my client. There is a method in my loader that is supose to define the path but it does nothing. here is the path i changed in my loader: public static String getCacheDir() { return System.getProperty("user.home") + "/Guardian718/guardian/matrixcache"; } but when i run the server the Cmd box still says its loading the previous path witch is guardian/live and loads the old background and what not. is there any other way i can change this path so my client recognizes it and actualy uses it? thank you

Read full topic
